titleStmt.title: Iniunctions with certaine articles to be enquired of in the visitation of the Reuerend Father in Christ, Iohn, by Gods prouidence, Byshop of Norvvich, aswell to the clargie, as to the Churchwardens and quest men of euery seuerall parish within the dioces of Norvvich, [and] to be put in execution, by al the Archdeacons commissaries [and] other officers exercisinge ecclesiasticall iurisdiction, vnder the sayd Bishop in their synodes, visitation, and courtes. In the yeare of our Lord God. 1569.
Visitation articles. 1569
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Norwich. Bishop (1560-1575 : Parkhurst)

titleStmt.title: Iniunctions with certaine articles to be enquired of in the visitation of the Reuerend Father in Christ, Iohn, by Gods prouidence, Byshop of Norvvich, aswell to the clargie, as to the Churchwardens and quest men of euery seuerall parish within the dioces of Norvvich, [and] to be put in execution, by al the Archdeacons commissaries [and] other officers exercisinge ecclesiasticall iurisdiction, vnder the sayd Bishop in their synodes, visitation, and courtes. In the yeare of our Lord God. 1569.

titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Norwich. Bishop (1560-1575 : Parkhurst)
Parkhurst, John, 1512?-1575.

notesStmt.note: The Trinity College (University of Cambridge) Library copy has a cancel slip with "serue" pasted over "ferme" on A2v line 16; not present in the Bodleian Library copy--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
